etymology.description: Depicts a bow, showing the shape of an arched weapon
etymology.interpretation: The character 弓(弓) (gōng, "bow") visually represents the curved shape of a bow, a straightforward pictogram emphasizing its physical form.

examples.chinese: 弓是古老的武器(弓是古老的武器)。
examples.english: The bow is an ancient weapon.

examples.chinese: 他拉起弓(他拉起弓)，瞄准远处的目标(瞄準遠處的目標)。
examples.pinyin: Tā lā qǐ gōng, miáo zhǔn yuǎn chù de mùbiāo.
examples.english: He draws the bow and aims at a distant target.

examples.chinese: 女战士操纵弓(女戰士操縱弓)，迅速释放箭矢(迅速釋放箭矢)。
examples.pinyin: Nǚ zhànshì cāozòng gōng, xùnsù shìfàng jiànshǐ.
examples.english: The female warrior manipulates the bow and swiftly releases the arrows.
